verbs.description: [ARG0: A lawyer for President Trump] [V: argued] [ARGM-LOC: in a Sunday filing] [ARG1: that the president should be the first to review the materials] .
A lawyer for President Trump argued in a Sunday filing that the president [V: should] be [ARG2: the first to review the materials] .
A lawyer for President Trump argued in a Sunday filing that [ARG1: the president] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: be] [ARG2: the first to review the materials] .
A lawyer for President Trump argued in a Sunday filing that the president should be [ARG0: the first] to [V: review] [ARG1: the materials] .
